title: Add skill matching hints to descriptions
description: Per research: 'Tool description is the most high-leverage point. Should explain WHEN to use, WHEN NOT to use, and provide context.' Improve skill descriptions with trigger words and negative instructions.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add trigger words to each skill (what user might say)
Add 'Do NOT use for:' section where applicable
/coderabbit: 'Use when reviewing code, preparing PRs. NOT for: runtime debugging'
/convex: 'Use when working with Convex backend. NOT for: other databases'
/linear: 'Use when managing issues. NOT for: general git operations'
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
